verbs.description: sf [ARG0: gay men chorus] to [V: play] [ARG1: st ignatius] decades after church rejected it with its members’ unceasing joy artistic flair and proud - to - be - me mentality it hard to imagine anything more quintessentially san francisco than the gay men chorus but 37 years ago the still - new singing group was n’t welcome in all corners of the city in a devastating blow that made headlines around the bay area the chorus’ april 25 1981 concert at st ignatius church was canceled weeks beforehand by archbishop john quinn he said the concert could be misinterpreted as the catholic church approving of homosexuality which he considered immoral the chorus which had already sold tickets and hired the berkeley symphony orchestra to accompany it argued the cancellation was a breach of contract superior court writer berkeley symphony orchestra totalmuni2018 most holy redeemer catholic church st ignatius joe garofoli supervisor harvey milk tim seelig aids archbishop john quinn san francisco st ignatius robert rufo ellie dehn bonfiglio academy of art university catholic church 82x - levi plaza bernal heights st ignatius concert editor phil matier archbishop salvatore cordileone gay children creativity museum chief audrey cooper st ignatius church forest hill maryland totalsf st ignatius concert everett middle school jim bohannon randy laroche greg bonfiglio director grand theater bay area official castro the chronicle tom burtch sansome peter hartlaub st ignatius church

sf gay men chorus to play st ignatius decades after church rejected it with its members’ unceasing joy artistic flair and proud - to - be - me mentality it hard to imagine anything more quintessentially san francisco than the gay men chorus but 37 years ago the still - new singing group was n’t welcome in all corners of the city in a devastating blow that made headlines around the bay area the chorus’ april 25 1981 concert at st ignatius church was canceled weeks beforehand by archbishop john quinn he said the concert could be misinterpreted as the catholic church approving of homosexuality which he considered immoral the chorus which had already sold tickets and hired the berkeley symphony orchestra to accompany it argued the cancellation was a breach of contract [ARG1: superior court writer berkeley symphony orchestra] [V: totalmuni2018] [ARG2: most holy redeemer catholic church st ignatius joe] garofoli supervisor harvey milk tim seelig aids archbishop john quinn san francisco st ignatius robert rufo ellie dehn bonfiglio academy of art university catholic church 82x - levi plaza bernal heights st ignatius concert editor phil matier archbishop salvatore cordileone gay children creativity museum chief audrey cooper st ignatius church forest hill maryland totalsf st ignatius concert everett middle school jim bohannon randy laroche greg bonfiglio director grand theater bay area official castro the chronicle tom burtch sansome peter hartlaub st ignatius church
